tool_description:
Allow customers to transfer funds seamlessly from their DBS bank accounts to other parties through your app! Account verification features are hosted by DBS to ensure there’s no security risk to your business and customers.

Due to security reasons, some functionality won't work on the Mashape Marketplace. Sign up on our website at http://bit.ly/fundtransferapi for full testing and sandbox features !
name: DBS Funds Transfer
title: DBS Funds Transfer

api_list.name: returns list of banks
api_list.description: Returns list of banks with details on code for money transfers.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dbs-developers-funds-transfer-v1.p.rapidapi.com/referenceData/banks/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dbs-developers-funds-transfer-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dbs-developers-funds-transfer-v1.p.rapidapi.com/referenceData/banks/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dbs-developers-funds-transfer-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieves status of a fund transfer
api_list.description: Retrieves the status of a fund transfer request for a given transaction reference identifier.

api_list.name: Retrieves list of scheduled transfer requests
api_list.description: Returns list of transfers requests that are scheduled for a future date.
